title: Love Island’s Megan Barton Hanson subtly shades Chelcee Grimes after ‘split’
text:
Megan Barton-Hanson has reportedly split from girlfriend Chelcee Grimes (Pictures: Rex/Getty)

Megan Barton-Hanson has reportedly split with her girlfriend Chelcee Grimes and it looks like she’s got a few things to say about it.

The Love Island star started dating Chelcee last month, following her break-up with Towie’s Demi Sims.

A music industry insider claimed: ‘They got on really well and enjoyed a brief romance, but decided to call it a day earlier this week.

‘Both were a bit upset about it, but remain pals.’

They added to The Sun that Chelcee is working hard on her music and it’s ‘taking her mind off her love life.’

Megan shared her outlook on their ‘split’ on Instagram, with some choice words about relationships and sex.

The 25-year-old reposted three graphics from Instagram account Female Collective to her story.

Is Megan Barton-Hanson subtly shading Chelcee Grimes? (Pictures: Megan Barton-Hanson/Instagram)

The first affirmed: ‘2020 is in 3 months: we’re having good sex with people who deserve us, staying hydrated, leaving behind toxic relationships, communicating our feelings, not letting anyone waste our time, and spoiling ourselves with love!’

While the second said: ‘Don’t forget to hydrate, meditate, masturbate’.

And the third (quite rightly!) proclaimed: ‘Reminder: Relationships are supposed to make you feel good.’

Chelcee then also posted a series of stories to her Instagram account that could also point to a split between the two.

One poem from Arch Hades read: ‘Instead of standing by my side, you tricked me into conceding. Into dimming my own light, feeling guilty for succeeding.’

She also posted words of encouragement to ‘anyone who needs it’: ‘Don’t forget who you are.’

Megan went public with her relationship with Chelcee last month and Chelcee called her ‘the perfect girl’.

On Instagram stories, Megan wrote: ‘SO proud to call this absolute babe my GIRLFRIEND. Swipe up to watch the full Time to Talk video now!’

Megan starred in the video along with Chelcee, and the singer added on its release: ‘Thank you for all your lovely messages about the “Time to Talk” video!

‘And another thank you to @meganbartonhanson_ for being the perfect girl 😍 This video is my most personal one yet. What’s your favourite part?’ she added.

Megan Barton-Hanson and Chelcee Grimes were approached by Metro.co.uk for comment.
